title: How to Draw a Simple Cartoon Dog

steps.headline: Start with 6 small circles drawn together.
steps.description: It should kind of look like a caterpillar.

steps.headline: Draw 2 lines on the bottom of the first circle from the left.
Draw lines on the remaining circles for the other 3 paws.
Start in between the 1st and 2nd circle and draw an arch that lands in between the 3rd and 4th circle.
Draw another arch a little bigger than the first that starts in between the 3rd and 4th circle and ends on the last circle.
Make a little triangle-style tail on the upper right side of the larger arch.
Scribble in a small nose in between the 2nd and 3rd circle.
Draw a small arch on top of the 2nd circle and another one on top of the 3rd circle.
steps.description: These should be small and they should stay inside the first arch that you drew. These are the eyes.

steps.headline: On the head, make 2 ears of any style you want, one on each side of the arch.
Refer to the illustration in the introduction for the completed dog.

text: Start with 6 small circles drawn together. It should kind of look like a caterpillar. Draw 2 lines on the bottom of the first circle from the left. This is a paw. Skip the next 2 circles.  Draw lines on the remaining circles for the other 3 paws.  Start in between the 1st and 2nd circle and draw an arch that lands in between the 3rd and 4th circle. This is the head. Draw another arch a little bigger than the first that starts in between the 3rd and 4th circle and ends on the last circle. This is the body. Make a little triangle-style tail on the upper right side of the larger arch.  Scribble in a small nose in between the 2nd and 3rd circle.  Draw a small arch on top of the 2nd circle and another one on top of the 3rd circle. These should be small and they should stay inside the first arch that you drew. These are the eyes. On the head, make 2 ears of any style you want, one on each side of the arch.  Refer to the illustration in the introduction for the completed dog.
sentences: Start with 6 small circles drawn together.
It should kind of look like a caterpillar.
Draw 2 lines on the bottom of the first circle from the left.
Draw lines on the remaining circles for the other 3 paws.
Start in between the 1st and 2nd circle and draw an arch that lands in between the 3rd and 4th circle.
Draw another arch a little bigger than the first that starts in between the 3rd and 4th circle and ends on the last circle.
Make a little triangle-style tail on the upper right side of the larger arch.
Scribble in a small nose in between the 2nd and 3rd circle.
Draw a small arch on top of the 2nd circle and another one on top of the 3rd circle.
These should be small and they should stay inside the first arch that you drew.
On the head, make 2 ears of any style you want, one on each side of the arch.
Refer to the illustration in the introduction for the completed dog.
